code: import{GET_USER_HASHTAGS,GET_GROUP_HASHTAGS,GET_POPULAR_HASHTAGS,GET_HASHTAG_POSTS}from'./types';import{dispatchHelper}from'../utils/utils';export var getUserHashtags=function getUserHashtags(username){return dispatchHelper(GET_USER_HASHTAGS,'get-user-hashtags',{username:username});};export var getGroupHashtags=function getGroupHashtags(group_id){return dispatchHelper(GET_GROUP_HASHTAGS,'get-group-hashtags',{group_id:group_id});};export var getPopularHashtags=function getPopularHashtags(){return dispatchHelper(GET_POPULAR_HASHTAGS,'get-popular-hashtags');};export var getHashtagPosts=function getHashtagPosts(hashtag){return dispatchHelper(GET_HASHTAG_POSTS,'get-hashtag-posts',{hashtag:hashtag});};
